alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:19PM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...From 2 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
